name: Innovation
description: This event will make you think out of the box,Technical challenges may inspire new ideas when approached with a broader prespective

name: InterDisciplinary Skills
description: Exposure to diverse events fosters a well-rounded skill set, combining technical expertise with cultural awareness and sportmanship

name: Adaptibility
description: Involvement in technical, cultural and sports activities hones adaptibility by navigating different challenges and scenarios

name: Leadership
description: Organising or participating in various events provides opportunities to develop leadership skills, whether leading a technical team, coordinating cultural activities or managing sports competitions

name: Networking
description: Meeting people from different fields can create valuable connections, opening up possibilities for future collaborations and career opportunities

name: Wellness
description: The inclusion of sports events promotes physical well-being, offering a balance to the mental challenges presented by technical and cultural activities
